review_body: We have stayed at the Arco tree times always clean, well positioned on the 22 tram route, Breakfast good, Very helpful friendly staff, knowledgeable about the area and what events are occurring in the city
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Though I had read previous reviews about Arco, I wasn't completely sold, because of the way the entrance looked. But "looks may be deceiving", and so I got to have an almost perfect stay. Clean, cozy, very very nice all in all. The staff was great! Always friendly and ready to help you with anything. The breakfast buffet simple, yet I didn't miss anything. Plus you could always "order" ahead, if you wanted something special.A great experience, indeed. Close to the city center, by tram/bus/metro or even foot. And there's a nonstop store just next to the Apartments. I would recommend it to anyone!
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The service was great, they were really kind and helpful.The connection with city center via tram or metro, you are in the old town in 15 min or 25 if you go walking.The qulity/price is really good.I would recommend this hotel for sure.
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My son booked this hotel for uswe enjoyed our stay, the accomadation was for bed and breakfast. the breakfast consisted of cold meats and cheeses, yogurt, fruit, bread, toast, orange juice tea or coffee.the room was clean and tidy, lots of equipment including fridge, kettle, cups, plates and cutlery.Good transport links to the centreStaff were very helpful and knowlegdeable about the area.Havlyckody sady park nearby, winery, cafe and restaorant with some beautiful walks
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We love to stay at the Arco guesthouse. The staff are very friendly. Location is great - short walk to the tram, and within walking distance of many clubs and restaurants in Vinohrady. Our room was large, quiet and light with a small kitchen and a very comfortable bed. Breakfast is ok, served in a nice room. We will come back again.
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we stayed at arco in october 2005the room was actually a small apartment, very clean ,spacious, warm, no traffic or other noise though facing the street ( building right next to reception). the price was logic and breakfast adequate.front desk quite friendly ... but we didn t see other guests and in a place like this you expect to socialize a bitalso it is out of centre but the tram runs 24 h and is easy to use, taking no more than 15 min to reach everythingwe would recommend this place wholehartedly..
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I hate to disagree with the other visitor to ARCO. I found the hotel easy to find, with their online directions. It was also very convenient to the city sights. It is right on a tramline ( no. 23 ) it was a pleasant 20 minute ride to Prague Castle, and a ten minute trip to the center of town. Comparing this to an hour ride to reach downtown, on a bus that runs once an hour in my home town of St.Petersburg Florida, there is no comparison. The room I had was on the third floor of an apartment building two doors up the street. It was reached by a secure key operated elevator. It had a kitchenette, and a very nice private bathroom. Although it was still fairly cool outside, the room was warm and comfortable. The only problem I encountered was using the European style lock, which I was not familiar with. ( twice around to lock, and unlock ) The Hotel has an on site cafe with inexpensive internet access ( 40kc for 10 mins about $1.25 ) I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Prague.
hotelName:
8    ARCO Guesthouse
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed our 4 day-long stay at Eden. Room and service was very nice and breakfast was perfect. Everyday was something new to choose. It is little bit far way from city centre, but no problem with public transport even during the night.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A quiet, well-positioned hotel. The breakfast was delicious, diversified, the advantage that you can enjoy it on the outdoor terrace. Coffee and fresh fruit at your discretion. As a suggestion waiters to be more charismatic, smiling, I always saw them frowned and it's not good. The receptionist was smiling. very politely polite. Be more careful with camera details (broken bed lamp, glued with adhesive tape not ok ...) Small details make the difference. Otherwise, only good words, clean cleaning service
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Was going to a concert at the stadium so location was perfect. In under five minutes after the concert I was in my hotel room. The hotel has a shopping centre and eating places right next to it. Trams very convenient and only a minute or two walk taking you right into the city centre. Hotel staff were very helpful and professional. Room was spotless, spacious and was well facilitated.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my partner had a wonderful stay here! The staff was friendly and let us store our luggage a couple hours before check-in so that we could freely explore the city. Breakfast was really good and had lots of variety! The rooms themselves were very clean and looked beautiful. All this combined with the excellent location (just outside of the busy part of the city but right next to a tram stop to get there easily) made for am excellent stay!
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Out of the historic center but very well located in a nice area. A shopping mall across the street. Access to transport very close and 20 minutes from the historical area. Very clean hotel with good breakfast and comfortable rooms. Staff friendly and helpful. We had a reservation problem upon arrival but solved it efficiently by the staff.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good hotel with nice rooms and staff. Tasty breakfast, nice location, not far from the center, tram stop just in 2 minutes away from the hotel. And tram 24 will get you to the city center just in 20 minutes.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an absolute great time . The staff were friendly, polite and helpful. The location was very close to the city center with trams running every 5 mins. The rooms were neat and comfortable. All required amenities were provided. We will without a doubt stay here the next time we come to Prague.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel:Very nice and clean room and the premises in general, exactly what you see on the pictures. Staff was friendly, polite and helpful from receptionists, bartenders to cleaners.Everyone spoke good English. Breakfast was good, big variety of eggs, sausages vegetables, cheese, sweets etc. Although, the restaurant area seems small, there was always enough tables and big terrace, which is open till 10 pm.! Note: be ready to pay tourist tax (per day per person) and 50 euro deposit ! Location: 30-45 minutes, by taxi, from the airport.30 minutes away from city centre, by tram or buss5 minutes away from shopping centre and big food shop (Tesco Extra) which is open 24 hoursStadium 2 minutes away McDonalds ! Note: very loud and overcrowded if you are staying there during the football game. As they start to prepare stadium (soundcheck etc. ) at 8 in the morning. Supporters start coming in at 11 in the morning. And after the game majority goes to the hotel bar or just stand outside singing for another 2-4 hours.Transportation:We downloaded taxi app on our phone called "Taxify" (very similar to Uber) allows you to pay cash to driver or card online. From airport we paid around 550 Czech Koruna. From city centre around 200 Czech Koruna.Also they have bikes and scooters to rent all around town. You just need to download the app, attach your bank card and enjoy the ride. When you done, you just leave it anywhere on the street, make sure to check as in some areas it's restricted to leave them!Mostly we used tram, the stop is 3 minutes away from hotel and they go regularly. You can buy tickets at the reception and they will also give you map and will explain everything. The only minuses for me were: - even tho I liked the neighbourhood, I still believe it was quite far from airport and city centre -coffee and juices at breakfast buffet were bad
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Having read some excellent reviews from this site, we had booked this hotel after having a great time at Crowne plaza in Amsterdam. We arrived at the hotel on 25 May and to our shock we found out the hotel has been outsold and our guarenteed reservation is not guaranteed any more. We were transfered to another hotel in city which they claimed 4 star and we slept on a broken bed ( So much for * rating). The next day we arrived at Eden hotel again to secure our guarenteed room and we were promised for an upgrade and excellent spacious room. After all the promise we thought finally our vacation is going to go on a good note..Nope. This is where the horror starts. In the night the A/C stopped working and when we complained, the staffs said that they have no technician on board and he will come only on the morning and leave at 5 pm. And the wonderful manager of the hotel is having a good time at his home. The temperature was not cold though.it was literally hot and atleast we requested for a fan and all we got was " Sorry u have to adjust until the technician comes tomorrow". So much for a four star hotel. The next day we requested to speak to the manager and a guy spoke to us claiming to be a manager who was so rude. If he was the real manager , then I can understand the standard of the hotel. During our first day as a mode of compensation the staff told us that we can check out late at 2:00 PM. But on the last day the staff Anastasia was adamant that we leave at 1:00. We tried to explain to her that it was her staff that promised us a late check out but I think she was programmed by God to tell only one thing in her life " U HAVE TO CHECK OUT NOW". The only silver lining on this stay is the staff named NIKITA who understood our concerns and was providing us with support with a smile always.Atleast he was not programmed and was a human being. But NIKITA, this hotel does not deserve you. It's time you work in a real 4 Star hotel. Given by the positive reviews and my negative one, I can only conclude that the staff treat people differently based on the Color of our skin. If you are brown LOOK FOR ANOTHER HOTEL WITHOUT A SECOND THOUGHT and maybe that's what the hotel wants as well.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very great stay with a nice room. There was a very good breakfast and nice and friendly staff. The hotel is just 5 minutes walk from the train station Slavia, wich takes you to the city within 15 minutes.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was very good, but for a strange smell, it was stronge like a lemon cleaning disinfectent, not in room, in corridors, foyer, by restuarant, which stopped us eating there, the food looked nice, and we watched it go past us on a trolly coming across from the one side of hotel going past toilets, lifts in foyer to restuarant with no covers on. may I surgest to Hotel to buy covers for the plates of food. The room was really good, nice size, clean, beds comfy, shower etc., clean and moden, tea, coffee and sugar surplied, could do with more coffee and some milk. given when asked for, Dressing gowns and slippers available, fridge, free safe, lovely big pillows, The staff mainly friendly, one guy at reception, spoke good English, very helpfull and friendly, nothing to much trouble, enjoyable stay except the funny smell. Trams great, a 22 gets you straight into the main city, and if you get a 24 hour ticket can travel around, hopping on and off trams, you can pay by card on tram in the machine. Choco loves Coffee, at pavlova stop, a must, cakes and coffee to die for, serves tea as well, McDonalds in main city is an experience.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely clean hotel . Friendly staff . Great breakfast . A great base to see Prague . Transport from hotel very easy .Eden shopping centre nearby . There is a minibar in the room and it has all the facilities .
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel staff is very nice and helpful. Rooms are cosy and very clean. Location is great, local transport is just by the hotel. Good price. Shopping mall is just behind the corner if there is anything urgently needed...
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was very nice experience. It is very easy to reach everywhere. We love it. People serve us was very helpful and friendly. I think the otel is the best in its group based on the price and the quality
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel. The beds were very comfortable, the room was spacious, and clean, with complementary toiletries. Breakfast was excellent with plenty of variety, with a choice of hot breakfast, toast, cereals, fresh fruit.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Worst hotel ever, dirty room above entrance, noisy and unable to open windows as staff and guests congregate smoking outside, carpet was filthy (Room 108) and adjacent to elevator so unbearably noisy at all hours, on arrival check in was by miserable staff member only too keen to swipe card payment, safe needed maintenance to replace batteries, I checked out after two nights and at further expense to myself, I transferred and then stayed in the Hotel PAV, what a difference, clean and tidy. See photos of Hotel Iris Eden room and awful stained carpets. I wouldn’t stay here ever again.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I chose this hotel for its proximity to the Slavia Prague stadium. It is basically part of the stadium.As such, it was excellent for the Slavia Prague V Chelsea game.We enjoyed pre- and post-match refreshments served by an excellent, hard-working bar staff, the bar staying open after the game until the last fan disappeared.However, the 4 star rating is a bit generous. The hotel is pretty basic...more like a UK 3-star, but clean with a comfortable bed and a decent shower.The room was hot though and the thermostat didn't seem to make much difference. The windows did open but that proved noisy.The hotel is 20 minutes away from central Prague and is in a fairly run-down area with few eating and drinking options apart from the ubiquitous McDonalds.Good for the football !And Chelsea won.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A lovely hotel set in a great location. Transport via tram (50m from hotel) to town takes about 25 mins. Airport 30 min drive. All attractions are very accessible from here. Great for taking in a football match as it is situated in the ground itself. Large shopping mall 100m away with lots of food outlets. Staff were friendly and breakfast is a large self- service buffet; great choice of cereals, fruit, meats, cheeses and more. Clean, welcoming and value for money.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is right by a tram stop, which is a great way to get around (it’s a little ways from the city center). Our room was very clean with a huge bathroom, and the breakfast buffet had so many choices. Front desk staff spoke excellent English and were very helpful with answering questions. It is attached to a sports stadium, but we hardly noticed that.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was nice and clean beds changed everyday and bathroom towels changed, safe available in room and iron available at reception, the hotel is situated in the football stadium and there was a match on when we were there, we didn’t have a stadium view but could hear everything going on and there were thousands of people coming and going a little noisy but fun to watch everybody going in, trams around the corner going into the centre of Prague this is about 30 mins ride, shopping centre and food court over the road from hotel. Wouldn’t stay again just because it’s a little far out from centre but the hotel is very good.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Hotel Iris Eden for our 20th wedding anniversary. It was clean, friendly and well situated with good tram links to both Old town and Lesser town. The hotel is attached to the football stadium and even with a large game (Prague vs Chelsea) it wasn’t too noisy. The front desk were very helpful and the staff friendly. Great place
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are nice and very clean. Great location, easy access to transport and nearby amenities. Breakfast is okay, plenty of choice! Service is friendly, would recommend for anyone looking for a break away.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Goo location just a quick ride from old town, staff were very helpful and made our stay very easy, would highly recommend to anyone looking for a city getaway, hotel room was perfect size and the hotel was good prices, was very clean and quiet
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I became an upgrade to a room with Eden stadium view, wich was unexpected and great ! The stuff was very friendly and helpful. There was a bottle of wine in the room, but no wine-glasses. I borrowed 2 glasses at the lobby-bar. Overall this hotel is great for football fans ( especially if a match is playing in the stadium ), or for generally Praha visitors. The train and tram stations are close to the hotel. A shopping centre with a supermarket and foot court is right next to the hotel.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent in the hotel 3 nights. Hotel room was very quiet, I had huge bath. Breakfast was very good buffet style with enough food of all kinds even at nine. Staff was extremely friendly. And I received personalised thank you letter last morning :) thank you for very nice 3 nights :)
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean rooms - Comfy beds/Good showerNice hotel Friendly staff - Helped us get checked in quick without any hassle Decent location,a quick 10 minute uber to the old town gets you to the nightlife with ease
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely clean hotel, rooms lovely, modern and fresh. Hotel is in a great location only 15 minutes to city centre on a tram. Located close to large shopping centre too. Friendly staff, would definitely come again! :)
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 4 nights, upon arrival the receptionist only gave us a card key for one room (there were 3 of us), I informed her that I had booked 2 rooms and showed her the email confirmation however it took her some convincing that this was true..not sure how 3 of us were supposed to sleep in a twin room anyway, but that did not occur to her. The actual hotel was pleasant and in a convenient location, not too far from the centre and has a big shopping centre round the corner. The breakfast options were also pleasant. I was however disappointed with the cleaning of the rooms, on more than one occasion we came back to our rooms and found that the teas/coffees hadn't been replaced and the mugs were left dirty.. not impressed by that...Overall a reasonable stay
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel situated 20 minutes away from Prague centre, located within easy access to a tram stop which allows easy travel to the sights of Prague.Hotel is fantastic, clean tidy, modern and comfortable.Hotel staff are really friendly and are happy to help you with queries. I would highly recommend this hotel. We were lucky enough to stay whilst Slavia Prague were playing in the stadium connected to the hotel. Hotel operates seamlessly on match days and Slavia fans are friendly and a lot less intimidating than UK fans.Hotel is great value for money and is located 25 mins away in an uber from the airport.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean and tidy room, friendly and helpful staff always willing to assist. Easy access from hotel to metro and trams, mall across the road makes for convenient cheap shopping. Look forward to coming back to this hotel
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for a few nights. Friendly and helpful staff - really comfortable bed - room cosy - everything you expect from a 4star hotel - included in price, extensive delicious breakfast. - 5 minutes away from Prague Centre - hypermarket a few minutes away. Enjoyable stay ****
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, rooms are very clean with lots of facilities and toiletries. Actual interior of the hotel (hallways mainly) could do with modernising or updating. Overall great location for weekend trip, just 10 minutes from central via an Uber. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked off of the groupon deal. Nice, friendly hotel. Buy a 24hr travel ticket from reception. Didn't eat / drink here we were mainly in old town so I'm not sure on prices. Don't use taxi from hotel seems very expensive just jump on a bus / tram. Rooms are big enough all the same design as standard. No English channels of the tv. Good facilities, actual hot water etc. The only issue I had was when we went up to the room upon check in i noticed black marks and yellowish staining all over the sheet for our quilt. So on our way out I mentioned it to the receptionist. She offered me a new room to which I said no we don't need that just a new sheet please she said okay so I thought it would get changed. NOPE. 2 days we had the quilt for, we even left it out facing up so the cleaners would see it and change it but they didn't. I didn't get a picture of the quilt but I did notice the black stuff on the curtains as well.Other than that it was a good hotel I would come again.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Low price for so many excellent services.The room looks fancy and clean ; it was not big but also not small. Medium size. The mattress is very very soft; I love it. For the breakfast, big variety of food in comparison with other hotels.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice stay at this hotel. We stayed here just after Christmas and before new year 2018. As a family this was perfect. The breakfast very good and facilities great! Service also good. Highly recommended!
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely excellent stay a pleasure I will be back without a doubt! Friendly staff and lovely breakfast which made my stay very enjoyable. Can’t wait to come back again next year with my family and friends
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were 2 couples booked 2 rooms in Christmas period. Rooms were very clean and having wardrobe to keep your luggage. one of the room did not have bathtub and when we asked the staff, they immediately gave us another room without any hesitation. Minibar was full with drinks but obviously it had price. One water bottle, one wine bottle and some cookies were kept on the table which was surprisingly complimentary. Breakfast had lots of options. Hotel in is football stadium and it also has big mall nearby and has free parking on the road. Hotel has private parking 12 euro per day but it was closed for some reason when we visited. But street parking was completely safe.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of the best options to stay in Prague, excellent price/value combination. The hotel is modern, room is big enough with spacious bathroom. Staff is efficient and polite. Breakfast is excellent with great choice of hot/cold plates and yummy cakes! Location is very convenient: tram stops practically in front of the hotel, providing quick and easy connection to downtown. Next to the hotel there is a huge shopping mall with good range of shops.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Adequate hotel for the stay. Very friendly service. Good food. Unfortunately, there was a football game at 19.Nov between neighbours Tchech republick vs Slovakia. Much too noisy outside from 5 pm to 11 pm. From 20-21 nov acceptable level of noise. Easy to get to city by tram.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Iam staying in this hotel from last 8 years very often and it never disappointed me. Everything is great about this place.rooms are spacious and clean. Breakfast is great as always. And most importantly it's just next to Slavia stadium.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights and we were shocked how nice it was, the rooms were very clean and the facilities were super. The staff were very helpful with finding our way around Prague and very polite.Thanks for a great stay
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect stay at a nice hotel. Room was clean, staff was polite, not only at the reception desk but during the breakfast time as well. Stayed there for three nights, every day there were clean in my room. The mattress was very comfortable, the pillow was too soft, but I can live through it. Thanks to the stuff, I will definitely spend my next trip at your beautiful hotel.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I spent 3 nights at Iris Hotel. Our room was very bright and spacious. I recommend everyone to try their delicious breakfast!All staff are very professional and friendly. They also helped us with booking tours.This hotel is great choice for traveling with family!!!
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a business trip and we was greeted by a rude man behind reception. Wasn’t helpful and walked off when iasked him a few questions. Got to the room I booked a double bed only to find it had 2 singles. Went back to reception to ask why this was and again the receptionist wasn’t very helpful. The bed and pillows are a disgrace, your body sinks in the mattress and the pillows are wafer thin. I wouldn’t recommend staying here!! There are cheaper and better hotels around the area
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We ve stayed for a weekend at this hotel, amazing breakfast, nice staff, not far away from center. You may buy tickets for public transport right at the reception, it's really convinient. Rooms are very clean and nice.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent choice. All facilities were at high level, very clean and comfortable. Continental breakfast available with large variety of foods and drinks, all at a greatly convenient price. Wish my stay was longer.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful experience with Prague's Hotel Iris Eden...The room was extremely clean...with all the necessary amenities and features.The luxurious breakfast spread gave us a a superb start to the day...and the friendly and helpful staff ensured our overall experience with the hotel was fabulous.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for six days in August. All the staff were very nice, reception staff were very helpful, the room we stayed in was fab! Had air con tea and coffee, little mini bar stocked with food and drinks ( just couldn't help myself! ) food in the restaurant was very nice especially the home cooked burger BBQ on the terrace! They have their own taxi driver who took us to various places and was very helpful and friendly. Will definitely stay there again next time we go!
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel, friendly staff, tasty breakfast. There is tram stop nearby, from which tram 22 can bring you to most tourist attractions.Only one downside: sometines it's crowded at the breakfast. (Consider commeing earlier/later)
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good stay. Nice room. Quiet. good location for meeting at ministry. Small beds though. Price ok. Breakfast ok funny to be in the backyard of the stadiumAll in all ok and fine. Large tvShower cell was not closing properly. Nothing more to add
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were directed to this hotel by the Don Giovanni hotel as they were over-booked. And to be honest we were not unhappy with that.Tis hotel belongs to the same group as Don Giovanni and is located in the Slavia Prague stadium opposite the Eden shopping mall.The hotel is pretty modern and has a bit less of a typoical hotel atmosphere as Don Giovanni.Rooms were spacious and clean. Good beds (better than in Don Giovanni) and internet was also much stronger.Breakfast was quite extensive, a bit noisy due to a large group of tourists but overall we enjoyed our stay.Definitely tinking of making this our new place to stay even though the Don Giovanni is opposite our office.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is not situated in the city centre and you have to take the tram to get to the centre but still, it is a very good and friendly place to stay. The rooms are spacious, beds very comfortable, the air conditioning and wifi work really well. The food is good as well and there always is quite a wide choice of everything for breakfast. Close to the hotel there is a big shopping centre with Tesco so one can do shopping for reasonable prices.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very good, spacious rooms, comfortable beds and friendly staff. The food offered by the hotel is of good quality. The location is perfect for tourists - close to the tram stop that will take you to the Old Town. Supermarket nearby. The hote is suitable for both - family holidays and buisness trips.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel with a great room. Free wifi and a very good and rich breakfast. Friendly and very helpful staff. Free parking not available so parking around the block was a little difficult. Hotel is around 3-4 kilometers from city center but public transport is quite cheap and on time. Hotel is definitely recommended.
hotelName:
9    Iris Hotel Eden
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice place in a quite neighborhood, walking distance to all the sites, rooms are spacious and contemporary...Not a lot of restaurants in the immediate area but no worries, there are thousands on the other side of the river.. Pet friendly, they had water and treats waiting for our dog...
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Awesome place to stay in Prague!Cosy modern interior with very helpfull staff! Walkable distance to historical centre!I've been very surprised (in a good way) by cleanless of our appartment! Was a pleausere to come back every night!Will definitely recommend this place and can't wait to come back again!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Such a wonderful and helping staff. Amazing apartments for families. Comfortable beds. Clean and well equipped kitchenette. The small garden is good for sitting and enjoying the weather. The location is good too.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved staying here, the rooms are spacious but cosy and comfortable, the coffee machine and hammock in the room were great additions; there are local snacks and drinks in the common area which is such a lovely homey touch and made it a great place to get tips and advice from travellers from before. Check-in in friendly and smooth, the staff attend to your requests with undivided attention, the space to leave luggage was also an excellent addition and facility to have. Each day, a little card with the name of the person who made up your room is left in your room, this is such a lovely touch, and it's nice to see places show they care about their staff.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great service, really nice and fresh rooms, close to the city and best of all it's right next door to a Cat Café. The hotell is really beautiful with great exterior. I really recommend Remember Residence
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here on a stag do recently and wow, what an amazing hotel. The reviews of this place are no exaggeration. It is truly fantastic. The staff were incredible, they couldn't do enough for you. They left little notes in each of the rooms welcoming us all to the hotel. They provide free biscuits, snacks and drinks in the reception area too.The rooms were immaculate. You have access to a fridge, microwave and basic kitchen amenities. Big screen tvs on the wall, dining table and chairs, wardrobes and a big sofa. There are even chair swings hanging from the ceiling, although I didn't quite trust that not to collapse on me so I stayed away from that ha ha.I would absolutely stay here again. Its unbelievable value for money and in a fantastic location. Look no further than this place for your stay in Prague.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this place based on review in TripAdvisor. Everything is perfect from pre-arrival communication, check-in, assistance with things to do, access to old town, restaurants, etc, and most importantly - firendly staff. Tips, book for the room at the top floor.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 우리는 2017년에 'Remember Residence'에 처음왔다. 그리고 그해의 경험은 2019년에 내가 다시 이곳을 찾게했다. 이곳에서 내가 언젠가 포크를 이용하여 인스턴트 라면을 먹었더니 며칠 후 RR팀은 주방에 나무젓가락을 가져다 놓았다. 나는 그들의 이런 배려가 고맙고 감동이다. 그리고 이것은 그들이 내게 한 배려중 극히 일부다.The RR Team always welcomes us to the entrance. But I can not speak English. I only know about 'Dobrý den, Je mi to líto' in Czech. With this excuse, I can not say what I want to say to them. But we are very glad that they are. Fortunately, with the power of the all-powerful Google, I can write a memo.We first came to 'Remember Residence' in 2017. And that year's experience led me back in 2019. One day I ate instant noodles with a fork, and then a few days later, the RR team brought wooden chopsticks to the kitchen. I am grateful and impressed with their consideration. And this is just a fraction of what they give me.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had an amazing stay at the remember residence apartments. Upon arrival we were greeted with a very friendly staff member and a quick check in. We had 3 apartments and they were all beautiful. We arrived to a bottle of champgne and a nice wee note. Very good location, closed to bars and restaurants and about 20.min walk from the main square. Would highly recommend and would definitely by back.Thank you
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are really satisfied of our stay at Remeember Residence: we felt at home! The staff is very kind and helpful and ready to help with any needs. Rooms are big, tidy and confortable and you can find everything you need; we really appreciated the coffee machine and the treats in the room. The hot apple drink in the common room was simply delicious. Great position, in a quiet neighborhood, but only a ten minute walk from the city centre. I think it was the best hotel experience we've ever had. Hope to come back soon, thank you for everything
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment was beautiful - large, clean, spacious. Staff were very helpful and friendly. It was very modern with lovely added extras, such as hot apple juice, biscuits and cake. Only about a 15 minute walk from the centre too. Could not rate Remember Residence highly enough.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Remember Residence is really exceptional. It reflects a great job backstage. Congratulations and maintain or even improve the level, even though today is the best! I really want to thank every single person who attended my family. They were so professional and charm. I coudn´t met Markéta; before our trip, she always answered my email questions too fast and effective. May be next time, but when?
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I don't usually write reviews, but after visiting RR and being a long time professional of the tourism industry, I felt I had to share my opinion.My partner and I just returned from Prague where we spent the weekend.The trip was a celebration of my partner's 40th birthday.I chose RR mostly because of the location (not centre, but close enough), the comfortable apartments (as they appeared) and the reviews. After researching, I had come down to two choices and I am glad I finally chose this one.We stayed at the luxury apartment.To begin with, the apartment was very clean. A fundamental necessity which is often overlooked by good category hotels in various destinations.The facilities are quite new, in very good condition and the essentials of good quality. The bed, for instance, was one of the best I have ever slept on.The heating was excellent with rather cold outside temperatures.The apartment is spacious and can easily accommodate three or even four persons. For two, it is ideal. We really appreciated the presence of two toilettes. While such a feature may not be necessary for most (ourselves included), we did find it quite convenient.There is plenty of natural light in daytime (at least in the mornings that we were there) and good lighting options in the apartment for the evening.The place was noiseless with a good sense of privacy.Overall, I can say that RR is value for money. I would gladly stay again on a future trip to Prague and would safely recommend this place to anyone I know.Thank you Alina for being so wonderful and for your good energy and thank you Marketa for arranging the surprise for my partner's birthday. Much appreciated.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I loved the place! Very cozy, cozy! The reception is wonderful! All staff are very kind !!!When I arrived in the room, there was a small handwritten letter on the table, addressed to me, wishing me welcome. There was still a small bottle of wine and some complimentary chocaletes.At the reception, there is a wonderful hot chocolate and delicious cookies offered for free. There is also coffee cups.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can’t recommend this “hotel” enough. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome. We were here for New Year’s eve and was given a lovely assortment of food and drink. They even gave our dog a present. The room was spacious, quiet and the beds were super comfortable. There is complimentary hot chocolate in the lobby as well as cookies. The location is in a quieter area but conveniently located. Well worth the price.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After three wonderful, cozy nights at Remember, I can't say enough positive things about this place. Lida's welcome was like nothing we have ever experienced. So warm and friendly! The handwritten notes from management, the treats (biscuits and advent calenders for the kids), and other wonderful little touches made us feel as if we were staying at a place where the hosts genuinely care. Thank you Marketa, Lida and crew for providing the Ferguson Family a home away from home for Christmas. I normally like to try different places when I return to a city, but I can state without hesitation that the next time I/we visit Prague, we won't even need to think about where we stay (as long as they have the space!): RR, of course! Thanks again!The Fergusons
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 첫 번째 프라하 가족 여행을 계획할 때, 가장 중요한 것은 숙박시설의 선택이었다.프라하에는 호텔이 너무 많아서 고르기 쉽지 않았다.우리는 여행자의 평가, 위치, 서비스를 검토하고 지난 6일 동안 세 곳에 머물렀다.만약 내가 다시 프라하를 방문한다면, 나는 망설임 없이 6일 동안 여기에 머무를 것이다.공항에서 RR까지 픽업 서비스를 통해 안전하고 편안하게 RR(Remember Resistance)에 도착했고 침대, 주방, 화장실은 매우 깨끗했으며 방은 따뜻했다.3일 동안 머물면서, 나는 프라하 투어를 위해 RR 팀원들로부터 많은 정보를 얻을 수 있었다.우리는 RR 팀원이 소개한 근처 식당에서 좋은 음식과 좋은 시간을 보낼 수 있었다.안델메트로, 레지오제트 버스 정류장(to 체스키 크룸로프)까지, TESCO은 걸어서 10분 거리에 위치해 있다.우리는 RR에서 1 분 거리에 있는 트램을 타고 프라하 성과 올드 타운 광장을 방문했다.위의 모든 것보다 더 중요한 것은 RR 팀원의 따뜻한 마음으로부터의 진정한 서비스였으며, 나는 그것이 나뿐만 아니라 우리 아이들에게도 매우 인상적이였다 라고 생각한다.나는 RR에 머무르는 많은 여행자들이 프라하와 함께 RR팀 멤버를 항상 기억하기를 바란다.우리가 머무르는 동안 RR의 진정한 친절에 감사합니다.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about this place is wonderful. From the friendly generous staff to the great location to the modern but cosy apartment. Upon in arriving in late November we were met with hot drinks cakes and biscuits. Our room had a bottle Proscecco, sweets and a hand written letter.The staff couldn't have been more polite, friendly and helpful. Remember Residence has a personal touch that I have never experienced in any hotel before. The whole place has a welcoming, comfortable feel. Its positive and well meaning welcome set me and my partner up to experience to beautiful city of Prague. I have never been to Prague before and I can't wait to get back there and one of those integral elements of that experience was this wonderful hotel. On our last day there we went out for the day we left our cases at the hotel to pick them up at the end of the day. At the end of that wonderful day there by our bags was a beautifully ornate cake, two bottles of water and another handwritten thank you note. A truly unforgettable place. Thank you Remember Residence a truly magical hotel. Book this place you won't regret it.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment we stepped through the doorway until the moment that we left the place, it was clear that this was a place that took care of every part of their guests’ journey. They made sure that we felt welcome with warm drinks and cookies, the room was lovely and comfortable and well equipped and the front desk went out of their way to help us with our queries and luggage. We were even helped out when we left and they made sure that we had no worries headed to our train. Highly recommended!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely, clean, beautiful rooms. Could not fault this place. I would definitely book again. The rooms are so spacious and the finishing touches were brilliant. They think of everything and include the small things you tend to forget when going away. The staff here are so friendly. I'd say this is one of the best places I've ever stayed. It should be a 4 or 5 star apartments.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I cannot recommend this property enough for its location and services. I used the kitchen daily to prepare breakfast, which is the one American meal I miss most while abroad. The close proximity to public transportation, tourist sites, and shopping added to the property’s appeal. The residence is located about a 15-minute walk from The Charles Bridge, John Lenon Wall and a modern art museum. The light rail is just two blocks from the front door and 1-day or 3-day passes can be purchased at Andal station, which is about a 15-minute walk from the hotel (walk two blocks to light rail, turn left and walk several blocks until you see the Andal subway station on right side of street (tickets purchased inside at a kiosk or machines if you have exact change). The residence staff are friendly and as a gay couple, we were treated with dignity and respect. We were in Room 13 which was both extremely clean and quiet. The neighborhood is NOT over flowing with tourists unlike the rest of Prague. There are a number of ethnic restaurant choices in the neighborhood including a great café called Café Savoy where we had a traditional Czech meal. The restaurant at the Modern Art Museum offers a wonderful view of the river and Pilsner on tap – just sayin. If you want a refuge after a day of site seeing, this place is wonderful. You can be in the middle of all the action in under 10 minutes with the light rail. You will appreciate the location as much as the well-designed layout of the apartment.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have just returned from a fantastic short break staying in the Remember Residence Prague. It is the perfect setting - quiet but still close enough to the main attractions. The rooms are beautiful and clean and have all the facilities you need. We had a loft room that was plenty big enough for the 3 of us. The staff are all very helpful and nothing is too much trouble for them. We cannot recommend the Remember Residence highly enough and look forward to visiting again soon
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel of the future.Excellent location. Far enough from the hundreds of tourists. But close to most attractions of Prague.Excellent room (see pictures). Convenient and modern luggage deposit at checkout day (picture).But the best is yet to come:1- As they knew it was our anniversary trip, they arranged for our arrival a delicious chocolate cake with sparkling wine (picture) in our room.2- As we checked out, my wife forgot her coat at the hotel. I got in touch with the manager Markéta, who saved no efforts to make it delivered to our next hotel in Budapest, as the best way as possible. We could fell all the time they did care with us.Thank you very much, Remember Residence team! You are really unforgettable! A team to always Remember of.Renata e João Alberto Maradei PereiraO hotel do futuro!Não precisa procurar mais hotel em Praga. Vale cada centavo da diária.Localização excelente. Longe da muvuca de turistas, mas perto das principias atrações da cidade. Quarto excelente (fotos). Eles disponibilizam um moderno depósito de bagagem self-service (digamos) para deixar as malas no dia do check-out (fotos). Equipe super-atenciosa.Mas o melhor ainda está por vir:1- Como era nossa viagem de aniversário de casamento, ao chegarmos encontramos no quarto um delicioso bolo de chocolate com espumante tcheco (foto);2- Minha mulher esqueceu seu casaco no hotel no dia do nosso check-out. Entrei em contato com a gerente por e-mail (Sra.Markéta). Super atenciosa e educada, não poupou esforços para nos ajudar e enviá-lo a nosso hotel seguinte em Budapeste (foto).Muito obrigado a essa equipe que nos ensinou o que é uma verdadeira e fantástica atenção ao cliente.Renata e João Alberto Maradei Pereira
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment we booked here I knew we had made a good choice thanks to the fantastic communication from the staff but I didn’t realize just how wonderful until we arrived. We are just leaving our first trip to Prague now and I would never consider another hotel for our second trip. The residence is small and intimate, it has a very friendly and knowledgeable staff, and it is immaculately clean. The rooms are very large with amenities that are hard to beat. The location is perfect it’s in a quieter part of town but all the tourist heavy areas are very easily accessible. It has all the convenience of an amazing location without the tourist feel. I wouldn’t consider anywhere else. It was a wonderful long weekend in Prague and we can’t wait to come back! Thank you so much to the Remember Residence team for making it extra magical.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here with my wife for one night only and was really happy with the whole experience. Firstly, the apartments were beautiful, spacious and very comfortable. The interiors have excellent design and are so well thought out, clearly with the guests needs the main concern. There are lots of little touches that make the guest experience special like the complimentary items in the apartment and giving us free bottles of water for our onwards train journey. Secondly, the staff were brilliant! The two staff members that we interacted with spoke perfect English and could not have been more kind and helpful, providing recommendations for dining, ordering us taxis and providing directions. Lastly, the location is perfect for exploring Prague, a short walk from the Charles Bridge and many other attractions. We would stay here again for sure and would recommend this accommodation for anyone visiting the city seeking quality apartments, good service and good value for money. Truly exceptional. Well done and thank you for enhancing our trip to Prague :)
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Remember Residence for 1 week in August and enjoyed our stay. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. They gave excellent advice on where to exchange money, buy groceries and restaurant choices. The location was great and old town was within walking distance. The Valtavo River is just two-block away and the scenery and we enjoyed the walk to the Old Town. The room was spotless and exceptionally clean. Our kids enjoyed sitting on the hammock. It was very spacious by European standard. We got take-out from the restaurant next door and the food was delicious. It's so convenient to just get take-out at the end of the days where everyone was tired. It's a beautiful apartment-hotel and will stay there again when we return to Prague.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This accommodation is charming and spacious. We were greeted upon arrival by a very handsome gentleman who was extremely helpful with restaurant recommendations during our stay. He also gave us a visitor map and highlighted the main tourist sites such as the Prague Castle. The rooms are actually small apartments with kitchens and dining tables. The bed is so comfortable due to a memory foam mattress. The only complaints I would have about the room are as follows: no body lotion or hair conditioner in the toiletries, the bathroom has one toilet and a boudet but the boudet smelled of urine during our whole stay no matter how long I ran the bathroom fan or ran water in the boudet. There was free water, coffee, biscuits & ice cream offered for the duration of each guests stay. We were also greeted with a small welcome bottle of champagne. The hotel has very good security and is located within one block of the river. There is also a super cute cat cage next door. The staff were always helpful with ordering taxis or making reservations for activities such as the beer spa, which was super fun and unique. The location of the accommodation is in an area that I found not to be the best for accessibility. I had to walk across the bridge and into the old town for night life and dinners. I had quite a lot of problems with taxis trying to scam me on my way to the hotel from other parts of town but obviously this is no fault of the hotel. I think this hotel is a great location for families. It is quiet in the evenings and felt very safe. The price of the accommodation is extremely reasonable and I had the best sleep in the accommodation.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 4 lovely days in Prague. Prague is a fantastic place, but our stay in Remember Residence made it perfect. Very nice appartments with all comfort you need. Perfectly located. A warm welcome note and even a goodbye note and some attentions. Whenever we will come to Prague, this will be our place to stay.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about our stay here was wonderful:1- very friendly and responsive staff2- they took care of all our baby needs and set up our room with a high chair, baby bath, full size crib, playing mat and toys!3- everything was clean and new 4- great kitchenette and decently priced items in minibar, free nespresso in the room and refreshments in the lobby were a great touch5- great location, 15 min. walk from Charles bridge and all the attractionsOverall- 10+ Will return again!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There are nothing more to say, if you going to prague dont miss this hotel.Its about 10 min walk of all the main attraction, 3 min walk to the tram stop. We stayed in 2 floor studio with 4 beds which can fit about 5 people. The main point of this hotel is the staff and the room. Right when you step into the room you will feel like home as everything was in detail and immaculate. They supply the welcome drink and chocolate too. Even wrote a personal welcome note. Arrived my my boy getting sick the staff is very attentive and informative we couldn’t ask for more. Bottom line is that you can book five star hotel with five star service but this hotel gives you right at home feel and nothing can beat that
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved our stay at the Remember Residence! Cute, one bedroom apartment with huge rooms! Such a nice change from the smaller European rooms we had stayed in. Driver picked us up from the train station and dropped us at the door. A small walk around the streets and there were numerous restaurants to eat in. A beautiful walk to the end of the street to the Vltava River and in the other direction to catch a tram. Easy, comfortable and very friendly staff, a great outdoor area and coffee & tea available made our stay here very Re-memberable :)
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From really friendly and helpful staff, to absolutely beautiful rooms and a great service for the money you get, this residence is the one you'll want. I couldnt think of anything to do better, even if I wanted! Full recommendation. Kindest greetings :)
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was stylishly decorated and big enough for our family of four. It was clean and it had everything we needed. The staff were very welcoming. It was only a few minutes from trams which took us everywhere we needed to go. Their attention to detail was noticeable.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights in March. It was conveniently located within walking distance of all the main sites but far enough out of the touristy centre. The room was very comfortable, I loved the hammock and walk in shower and the small kitchenette was great for storing a few breakfast items. We had to cancel our original booking last minute because our flight was cancelled but we had a really lovely email from the staff and were allowed to change our booking for no extra charge. On arrival there was a small bottle of bubbly and some chocolates and a handwritten welcome note which was a nice personal touch. I'd definitely recommend it and would go back again.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were so excited to stay here as the reviews were all excellent and it did not dissapoint! On arrival we were given a map with some restaurants to try and coffees which was a lovely touch. We booked an attic apartment and it was AMAZING! The room was spotless and we were given complimentary fizz, chocolates and a hand written letter welcoming us. The coffee was also really nice. The bed was huge as was the tub! Not only was the place lovely and clean but we were made to feel so welcome I almost didnt want to leave! The location was good, only a 10 minute walk anywhere and it was really easy to find! Would definately come back and recommend!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: That was awesome room (room 43). It was always clean. The staffs were very helpful and kind. The place is very closed to old town you can just walk 10 minutes to Charles bridge and others. I will choose this hotel if I come here again.Thanks for everthing
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: To the staff at Remember Residence,We want to thank you for your amazing stay in Prague. It was truly something to remember. The city is stunning for sure but the help organising our days, tour and restaurants made the experience so much better.Thank you so much for that.Congratulations on the good work
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed with family for 4 nights in Nov 2017. Amazing experience. Clean rooms. Well maintained. Kind and professional staff. very helpful. Nothing to say negative. Will certainly return. Thanks to Marketa and team!!!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Im writing this review in the room before I’ve even left because it’s that good! This is my first review of a hotel because this one truly deserves it. We came here for two nights as part of my boyfriends 21st birthday present. I spoke to the staff via email before we arrived asking if they could possibly decorate the room with balloons, they did this and more! They left balloons, banners, wine and even a cake! The hotel arranged for us to be picked up from the airport and we were greeted with a sign with my name and driven to the hotel, which is good because I have no sense of direction. The drive didn’t cost too much either. Once we got to the hotel a lovely lady gave us maps and showed us what we should go and see whilst we’re here and showed us to our room. She was a great help and I advise everyone to go and see Prague Castle!The room I booked was the deluxe room and even though I saw pictures online I didn’t expect it to be so nice! We had a lovely view from the windows and the room was huge, set out over two floors. The hammock was a nice touch although me and my boyfriend always tried to fight over it as it was surprisingly comfy. The room included everything you needed and even had two bathrooms, two double beds and a single bed and a kitchen with a dining table. Overall, the best stay at a hotel ever! No idea how it isn’t a 5 star hotel! The service and the rooms certainly are!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed and extended for three more nights. Totally impressed by the tranquility of the environment and cleanliness modern living space. It's very thoughtful for the management to spend energy on this 15 plus units to meet real client satisfaction. The rating is real reflection of all words.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 2 adults and 3 children in the deluxe apartment in the attic. Very nice room, and comfortable beds. Walking distance to the major sights. Would definitely book again if in Prague. Staff was very friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 3 nights while visiting Prague and cannot recommend Remember Residence highly enough. Reception / welcome was great. The room was spotless and awesome (deluxe loft apartment). A quiet spot no more than a 30 min walk or easy tram hop to most of the main attractions. If you’re a cat lover there’s also a cool cat cafe next door!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This apartment exceeded our expectations. It’s very clean and you can literally smell that the bedsheet is freshly washed. Housekeeping comes every morning to keep the place tidy. The location is convenient and walking distance to most of the attractions. For those who will take public transportation from the airport, take bus 119 and alight to the last stop. Walk towards tram 20 then alight at svandovo divadlo. From there you can walk towards the apartment around 3-5 mins walk. Kudos to the Receptionist who check us in. She’s very friendly and accommodating, Plus can speak really good English. I think the only thing that can be improve is the housekeeping, they don’t normally refill the body wash and shampoo so we had to call the reception to replace the toiletries. This was sorted out immediately. Nevertheless I’m still giving this a high rating and will def stay here again.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of the best places I have ever stayed! The way they welcomed us made us feel perfectly at home. Specially the welcome letter & the complementary treats made our stay even more comfortable. All thanks goes to the owner and the management team. I will highly recommend this place to anyone.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am very glad that I have visited this place. All the stuff is so kind. They are willing to help with all you need. Welcome message and all the gifts make it even more enjoying. Location is great, very close to city center. Also, plenty of parking in front of hotel :)
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very Nice. Everything is thought trough every last detail so you feel cousy here. Its a little bit girly though with all the gifts and notes but didn't bother me. These guys really make an effort for a great experience!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Remember Residence, and it was perfect, the staff were outstanding, they were helpful full of information and very lovely. We stayed in the attic room it was amazing, it was clean, and contemporary, my daughter loved the hammock in the room, it was so spacious, I literally cant fault anything, it was outstanding! The positioning of the hotel is also great as you can walk to the main tourist sights within 15 minutes but yet you haven't got the noise at night time, there are also bars and cafes on the door step and also the tram that takes you to the main tourist areas should you not want to walk, but everything is within walking distance, Prague is also a wonderful city, the best I have visited, so beautiful, reasonably priced and great people, have a good trip.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for two nights with my Dad and sister and we wish we had more time there. Enough room for three adults in one room. Close to many tourist attractions and restaurants. Clean, friendly staff and love the hammocks in the room and outside!
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place was fantastic. In a quiet street just 10 minutes walk to the main attractions. The property has obviously been recently renovated and everything was absolutely spotless. The staff were so friendly and helpful, would definitely recommend and stay again.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a new hotel. really nice everything us new and really cool designed. staff are brilliant and are a credit to the hotel the receptionists were extremely helpful and nothing was ever too much. cleaners also done a great job. rooms very Kevin spacey so lots of room for activities. would highly recommend
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice modern and spacious apartments. Well equipped and comfortable. Great shower. Good location with all relevant facilities nearby and good connections by public transport. Staff very friendly and helpful, even when we arrived late (using the taxi service of the place!). One minor detail: linnen and towels are changed daily by default, which in our view should not be the standard considering the environment.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Remember Residence last Weekend (12.-13. November).We were 60 students - and all of them were very happy with the apartments.It is all very new and nice. Perfect for family or friends. The beds were really comfortable and in the kitchen you find everything, what you need for cooking.Also the apartments are located in a really quiet area, so you here no traffic. But also you are quite near to the "Moldau" and also the the city.Even the breakfast was really good. With pancakes, eggs, croissants and sausages. :)The students loved it!We thank Markéta and her team so much for their hospitality.Best wishes,Annawith team of the OTH Amberg-Weiden
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a beautiful stay at this newly built apartment residence. The staff couldn't be more helpful. The location was perfect walking distance for visiting the city and castle while being in a quieter location.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in one of comfort apartments with my husband for one night. A modern apartment in a historical building - they have done a very good job renovating it - everything is finished to a high standard. The room was spotless, and the cleaning lady was extremely friendly - and so was the office staff, they were welcoming and happy to help. It was very easy to get there from the airport and the location is great, we didn't need to take any public transport to walk around the center of Prague. The kitchen has everything you could possibly need on a holiday - fridge, microwave, kettle, small hob etc. Good WIFI, comfy bed and good bedding,, safe, good hair drier, very good shower, toilet and bidet.. we really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend Remember Residence to our friends.
hotelName:
10    Remember Residence
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Modern, clean and comfortable hotel. Very nice staff. Near to the metro. Free, save parking. Supermarket only 3 minutes away (BILLA). 10 minutes to the city (Metro). Excellent breakfast. Tickets for the metro are available at the reception.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful place. The hotel was verry clean, people was verry helpfull and we are just happy go be there. Prague was soo beautiful, i hope i Will go ther one korę Time if i could. So people take your wife or housband and go travel!
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent here 3 nights with my wife. We liked the hotel due to it's location, cleanness and friendly staffs. Breakfast was moderate, room was big and clean,washroom was good too. Walking distance to metro station. Money exchange and metro tickets are available at counter. Finally, it is a budget friendly, small and excellent hotel for couples specially.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Close to the main sights of the city, very delicious various breakfast, nice people, parking opportunity, beautiful hotel, great prive-value ratio. We enjoyed our stay very much, its a wonderful city, we recommend everyone to visit it at least once.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Hermes is a great place to stay if you prioritise comfort and conveniance, and if you want to see and reach all of Prague, and not only the tourist traps of old town. Hotel Hermes is situated in a nice suburb to Prague, and 10 minutes on the tube, yellow line, will take you to city center. The rooms are very comfortable, light and practical and breakfast is good; exactly what you need without excesses. If you enjoy outdoor, trail running, walks or mountainbiking, there are great areas close to Hermes.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a pleasant stay. The rooms are very clean and the beds are very comfortable. Nearby there is a train station. The staff was very friendly. At the reception you can buy the tickets for the bus and also change Euros.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good value for money. It was close to the nearest station and easy to get around. Staff was friendly and the breakfast provided was good as well. I'd say if you don't mind staying slightly outside the down town then this is the best option you've got.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent here just 4 nights, but since we travelled around the country we can now affirm that this hotel is a good cheap choice. It's in the suburbs but It's well connected to the city center because the nearest metro station is just 50 meters away and it takes just 10 mins to the central metro station. Nice breakfasts. Rooms well cleaned. Kind staff members. Negative points: - the wifi doesn't work so well in the rooms; - the only thing that covers the window during the night is a small curtain so you're obliged to wake up early; - no way of getting a decent Italian coffe at breakfast (this is not a good reason to complain about, I know!)
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is very good for its price. Very nice comfortable and modern rooms. Breakfast was basic but nice, Staff was very helpful and nice. Located a little outside the city center but next to Janonice metro station although it was closed for construction but a shuttle bus runs to the next station and conveniently connected.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice newly updated modern hotel good for the price. Very helpful staff. A little outside the city center but conveniently connected through the metro. Janonice station is right next to the hotel. Breakfast was average but good for the price.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When we arrived. Hotel is in really good location. It is very clean hotel and the rooms are good size. Staff is fantastic and very helpful. It is in good location too. Close from city centre with subway. Subway is in 3 minutes walk. Breakfast is VERY poor. real basic and not there are not many choices. It is 4star hotel, but the breakfast is like in poor 3 star hotel. The Wifi is bad. We stayed in the second floor and we could not reach signal and if you need to work. You need to go to loby. They have external box for internet, but it doesn work. THey gave me 2 of them, but still did not work - so I had to go to lobby. Will I be back - No. Will I recommend this hotel to some one. If you looking for nice clean rooms and welcoming staff. Yes. If you need work and like breakfast in the morning. Dont go to this hotel.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful nice chic facility, the receptionists are really friendly and are very accommodating they offered us maps and suggested things to do while we are here. Breakfast was great and the room is nice as well. Only recommendation for people traveling bring face towels if you prefer them because they don't have any. But other than that it is a great stay. It has great safe secured parking. Really close to the subway station and the bus station that can take you practically anywhere you want to go. We will definitely be staying here next time we visit.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: great place near metro station, 10 min from downtown. the personal was very kind, service was very good, i do recommand each one looking for a nice place in prague to book in this hotel.really glad i choose this place
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is a great value for your money. The rooms are modern and clean, the bathrooms are spacious and the hotel bar has always some beverages ready for you. The hotel is right next to jinonice metro station and it takes only a couple of minutes to the city centre.Only downside of this hotel is the average continental breakfast, which wasn't that great. But again, really great value for your money. I was traveling with a child, the amenities and surroundings are capable for them.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Right after I booked out stay, emailed the Hotel the way of our check-in that was kind of complicated. Therefore, the front desk handled it and didn't make me feel they have to do an extra step for me what I really appreciated.The room was big enough for a couple, with not a spectacular view, however you don't need it if you want to explore the city.Breakfast was great and staff always made sure nothing is missing.The connection with downtown is easy because the subway station is 1 minute away from your room.Free and safe parking made my life so much easier.I definitely recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very nice hotel with elegant modern interior design. Staff were very friendly and helpful, rooms were super clean. The metro station was minutes away and a few stations away from all touristic attractions. The neighborhood was very calm and relaxing. Breakfast had limited choices, but good enough to start your day. When I had an issue with Wi Fi, they helped me with an access point that solved the problem on the spot. Nice price, great value for money. I would definitely come back to this hotel.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is close (<5 walking minutes) to the station Jinonice on Metro B, which takes around 10 minutes to drive to the city centre (costs 28 k).The lobby is poorly decorated. Personell at the lobby only gave us the required wifi adapter which you have to plug in in the room by yourself, after we asked why the wifi password was not working. The breakfast is very basic. Coffee is very bad, bread quite dry. We decided to have breakfast in the city after we tried it once.Double bed was actually two joined twin beds. The room design was very simple.The hotel safe in the room was already locked - I could not be bothered to walk down again to ask for it to be opened...The room was clean at least, so I still give three points.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is excellent and modern look, the bed is very comfortable. The staff is frinedly and helpful. The breakfast is delicious, and the private parking lot with the elevator is cool. The metro station is very close to the hotel (about 2 minutes walk).
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is quiet located outside the city center at a dead end street. New building and very modern rooms with all comfort. Clean and excellent beds. Air-co.The free and safe parking is under the hotel and secured by electric doors and video..From parking direct by elevator to hotel room with luggage.The underground station is only 5 minute walk. At the hotel reception you can by 24 hour tickets for euro 2,5. Within 15 minutes you are in the center of the city.Breakfast ok but not a great choice. Speed wifi could be improved.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We arrived to the hotel to be told that there had been a water incident in Prague 5 and the water had been shut off until the morning. We were a little disappointed by this as we'd have liked showers after a long day, but we understood this wasn't their fault. The hotel staff did a wonderful job of keeping us well supplied with water bottles and buckets of water to wash with until the morning. The rooms are bright, clean and spacious. The only downside is the blinds which let quite a bit of light in in the morning. There is wifi in the rooms as well as a tv, electronic safe and a decent sized bathroom. Location isn't a problem. I had read that the hotel was difficult to find which I disagree with as our taxi driver found it no problem and it's 5 minutes from the metro station. It's 30mins from the airport which is incredibly easy to get to and from using the metro and a bus. To get to the centre of Prague from this hotel, it takes approx 15 minutes on the metro which you'll find just around the corner. Metro tickets that last 30 minutes can be purchased from the hotel, these cost 24Czk (less than a £1). The ticket machines at the station offer tickets for different lengths of time but I'd advise buying a ticket from the hotel if you don't have any coins as the ticket machines don't accept notes. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, and answered every question we had. I was amazed to find that even after we finally left our room for the day after a heavy night out, our room had been made which we weren't expecting considering we'd left late in the day. Overall, this is a wonderful hotel with brilliant staff, we would definitely return here and I highly recommend it to anyone.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel! Breakfast was very good. Near metro. Convenient to go to downtown Clean, comfortable room.There is private Parking for free. Polite staff. Recommend. The bathroom has shampoo, soap, Hairdryer.
hotelName:
11    Herrmes
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were travelling by car. Hotel was easy to find and I left my car in safe, spacious, parking for the whole two night stay. Metro connection runs right next to hotel and takes you downtown in minutes. There were no restaurants or shops nearby yet - the surroundings are under development of the new. You might want to stop at Andel station for shopping etc. on your way back to the hotel - as advised by the staff. The staff is very helpful and has enterpreneur attitude to make sure you stay is pleasant. We had two bedroom room on the top floor - luxury in the price of ordinary. Everything is just nice and fresh. I even went running to the park on the hill nearby. Breakfast gives you nice start for the day in the city.
